name: cis-x
title: St. Jude cis-X
summary: Search for activating regulatory variants in the tumor genome

inputSpec.name: markers
inputSpec.label: Single nucleotide variants
inputSpec.help: Tab-delimited text file containing raw sequence variants

inputSpec.name: cnv_loh
inputSpec.label: CNV/LOH regions
inputSpec.help: Tab-delimited text file containing any aneuploidy region existing in the tumor genome under analysis

inputSpec.name: fpkm_matrix
inputSpec.label: Gene expression table
inputSpec.help: Tab-delimited text file containing gene level expressions for the tumor under analysis in FPKM (fragments per kilobase of transcript per million mapped reads)

inputSpec.name: snv_indel
inputSpec.label: Somatic SNV/indel list
inputSpec.help: Tab-delimited file containing somatic SNV/indels in the tumor genome

inputSpec.name: sv
inputSpec.label: Somatic SV
inputSpec.help: Tab-delimited file containing somatic acquired structural variants in the tumor genome

inputSpec.name: cna
inputSpec.label: Somatic CNV
inputSpec.help: Tab-delimited file containing copy number aberrations in the tumor genome

outputSpec.name: cis_activated_candidates
outputSpec.label: cis-activated candidates
outputSpec.help: cis-activated candidates in the tumor genome under analysis

outputSpec.name: sv_candidates
outputSpec.label: SV candidates
outputSpec.help: Structural variants (SV) candidates predicted as the causal for the cis-activated genes in the regulatory territory

outputSpec.name: cna_candidates
outputSpec.label: CNA candidates
outputSpec.help: Copy number aberrations (CNA) predicted as the causal for the cis-activated genes in the regulatory territory

outputSpec.name: snv_indel_candidates
outputSpec.label: SNV/indel candidates
outputSpec.help: SNV/indel candidates predicted as functional and predicted transcription factors

outputSpec.name: ase_gene_results
outputSpec.label: Gene level ASE results
outputSpec.help: Raw gene level allelic specific expression (ASE) results

outputSpec.name: ase_marker_results
outputSpec.label: Single marker ASE results
outputSpec.help: Raw single marker allelic specific expression (ASE) results
